meanings.definition: The state or quality of being illustrious.
meanings.sent1: Her illustriousnesses shone brightly among her peers.
meanings.sent2: The illustriousnesses of the famous actor was well-known.
meanings.sent3: The cat's illustriousnesses as the king of the house made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with the illustriousnesses of a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's illustriousnesses in the classroom made learning fun and exciting.

meanings.definition: The distinguished or celebrated status of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The town celebrated the illustriousnesses of its oldest resident.
meanings.sent2: The company's illustriousnesses attracted top talent from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The cake's illustriousnesses at the party made it the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak reached the illustriousnesses of the clouds above.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's illustriousnesses on the field inspired many young players.
